attributes.action: stop the increases in motorcycle tax proposed for 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that the motorcycle industry is facing some of its darkest days with sales slumping by around 25-30%, it makes no sense for any government to increase taxes on motorcycle ownership as is proposed in the Pre-Budget Report.  We petition the government to support the motorcycle industry as it has the car industry and freeze or lower Vehicle Excise Duty and provide some other stimulii for the industry and not to attack it further by increasing the cost of ownership for law-abiding citizens.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to stop the increases in motorcycle tax proposed for 2010.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=motorcycleved


Her Majesty's Government
